title: Oh Nanba Lyrics Lingaa Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Lingaa oh Nanba song lyrics
Singers : SPB
Music : AR Rahman

Oh nanba nanba vaa
Kalakkalaam vaa.
Yae nanba nanba
Vaan thirakkalaam vaa

Aasai irundhaal nanba
Sorgam thirakkum nanba
Naam aththanaikkum Aasaipattu muththeduppom nanba

Vaan vazhadhu kaiyyil
uli Idadhu kaiyyil
vazhve Namadhu kaiyyil

Oh nanba nanba vaa
Kalakkalaam vaa
Yae nanba nanba
Vaan thirakkalaam vaa

Idikka idikka idi irikka
Manakka manakka adhu manamanakka
Kalakka kalakka kalakalakka
Parakka parakka ada anal parakka

Un ellai arindhu kondaal
Thollao unaku illai
Veeney kanneerai thaandi
Thullaadhey.

Unnodu Selvam ellaam serthuko
Kondaada nanba venum paarthuko.
Hey munnorgal sonnaal yeththuko
Yezhaikku agaadhendrAL maaththiko

Oh sambo sandhosamaa
Oh sambo padalaamaa
Oh sambo vilayadalaama
Oh sambo aadalaama
Oh sambo thullallaamaa

Mannil inbam iyarkkaithaaney
Thunbam seyarkkaithaane
Mullil nee meththai thaiththu
Nee thoongaadhey

Moondru inbam kodhutha pinnaal
Kannaa nee kattupaadu
Thaandaadhey.

Idhayam thelivaaga vazhndhupaar
Inbam peridhaagi theeyumey
Unnai ellaarukum
Thandhupaar
Ulagam unadhaagi pogumey.

Oh nanba nanba vaa
Kalakkalaam vaa
Yae nanba nanba
Vaan thirakkalaam vaa

Aasai irundhaal nanba
Sorgam thirakkum nanba
Naam aththanaikkum Aasaipattu muththeduppom nanba

Vaan vazhadhu kaiyyil
uli Idadhu kaiyyil
vazhve Namadhu kaiyyil
